author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in aumento a 677,418 mld, prestiti marginali 90 mln Bond |
text: FRANKFURT, March 1 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 90 20 Use of overnight deposit facility 677,418 673,733 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click .
